programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian's decision to end her service in the military surprises everyone. Despite this, Ethan and his team continue to fish for information about David and his high-profile protectors. Rhian, meanwhile, starts living the quiet life she chose. Unknown to her, Franco has discovered what she is up to.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert decides to bring his family on a vacation to take a break from the stressful case of Romina. Robert then cherishes the moment of seeing his whole family complete and happy. However, he makes a shocking discovery about Daniela. Meanwhile, Cassie and Marga agree to be civil with each other. Later, Tope makes a revelation that catches Marga off-guard.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: After confessing her involvement in Romina's assault, Daniela begs Robert not to turn her in to the police. Despite his outrage, Robert chooses to protect his daughter. To make matters worse, Romina discovers Daniela's sworn statement to police and confronts her. Meanwhile, Hector finds out about the Mondragons' plan to move abroad and makes a desperate move.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: Thanks to Jenna's meddling, Tristan's transaction with the kidnappers fails. To protect his family, Tristan moves Aryann and Angelo somewhere safer. Meanwhile, Waldo deals with office politics.

programme.title: Magpahanggang Wakas
programme.desc: While Tristan struggles with Supreme Pacific's scandal, Chesca's kidnapping, and Angelo's worsening condition, the del Mars rejoice as Waldo fulfills his dream of becoming a full-fledged engineer. Soon, Waldo meets his big boss.

programme.title: Vince & Kath & James
programme.desc: Love can be complicated, especially when Vince agrees to secretly woo Kath on behalf of James, via text, while falling for her as well.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Bianca makes the national team, but an unfortunate event forces her to abandon her dreams. Carlos seeks a new marketing strategy for Tiger Shark and finds his ideal candidate in Bianca, making her an offer she cannot refuse.

programme.title: Always Be My Maybe
programme.desc: A make-up artist recovering from a breakup, relunctantly begins a relationship with a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: After Iris breaks up with him, Basti realizes he must fix his life. Instead of returning to Greece, he chooses to stay in the Philippines with relatives in Tayuman.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris tries to move on by finding a job and starting a business. Meanwhile, Basti makes a deal with Jomar, and Ali plans to tell Greggy his secret—until fate delays him again.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Rhian foils George's drug delivery and encourages Caloy to leave the syndicate. Fed up with Rhian's interference in his drug smuggling business, George puts Caloy's loyalty to the test by commanding him to get rid of the thorn in their side. Rhian makes a bold move in hopes of saving Eugene's grandson from the syndicate.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Following Marcial's order, Jessie tries to look for Rhian in Pampanga. Though her attempt turned futile, she eventually stumbles upon a lead that could bring her closer to Rhian's whereabouts and Pascal's allies. Rhian, on the other hand, receives a pleasant surprise from her friends from Barrio Sto. Francisco. Unknown to her, trouble is just lurking around the corner.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Romina becomes indignant upon learning that her rape case is dismissed. She later discovers that Robert kept mum about Daniela and Hector's connection. Filled with rage and disappointment, Romina leaves the Mondragon mansion. After Alvin’s release from jail, Hector carries out a plan to get rid of Robert immediately. Soon, a shocking news about Robert reaches Romina.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Carlos tries to talk to Romina about her accusation against Daniela and gets into a heated confrontation with his wife after seeing Romina’s proof that she is involved with Hector. Meanwhile, Robert is convinced that someone is attempting to take his life. Because of this, Robert confronts Alvin over his suspicion that the latter has something to do with the car accident.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya Alipio, a single mother of two boys, finds herself pointing a gun toward a man in a cemetery, faced with a difficult decision to kill a stranger so that her son, Paco, can live.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Relieved that her son is far from danger, Sonya decides to keep her word and heads to the police station to turn herself in for the crime she has committed.

programme.title: Always Be My Maybe
programme.desc: A make-up artist recovering from a breakup, relunctantly begins a relationship with a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: After Iris breaks up with him, Basti realizes he must fix his life. Instead of returning to Greece, he chooses to stay in the Philippines with relatives in Tayuman.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: During the triathlon event, Gabriel meets Carlos, but Carlos's personality leaves a bad impression on him. Gabriel is surprised to see someone who resembles his dear friend. Meanwhile, Bianca arrives in Zambales, hoping to find the Villorias.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: As the race begins, Bianca clings to her lucky umbrella, but Carlos takes it away to help her focus. She finishes second and captures the media's attention. While searching for her lost item, Bianca encounters Gabriel, which makes Carlos feel uneasy.
